text: Winchmore Hill Post Office Sorting Office The Winchmore Hill Post Office Sorting Office at Station Road, Winchmore Hill, London, is a grade II listed building with Historic England. It was designed by Jasper Wagerhttp://britishpostofficearchitects.weebly.com/winchmore-hill.html and built by Mattock and Parsons in 1904.http://services.english- heritage.org.uk/ResearchReportsPdfs/029_2008WEB.pdf == References == Category:Grade II listed buildings in the London Borough of Enfield Category:Winchmore Hill Category:Royal Mail Category:Sorting offices
title: Winchmore Hill Post Office Sorting Office
